events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and filed the initial claim to start the insurance process.
After review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the vehicle collision reported by the claimant.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accident cases has been assigned to handle the claimant's case promptly.
The claimant received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company.
Documents related to the vehicle damage and accident police report have been requested from the claimant for further processing.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and the official police collision report.
The investigation team has started reviewing all evidence and documents to verify the details of the vehicle accident claim.
The investigation into the claimant's vehicle collision has been completed; findings support the details provided.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover the repair costs and damages resulting from the auto accident to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and the responsiveness of the insurance team's communication.
The insurance company formally approved the claim, authorizing the payout to be issued for the vehicle damages.
Payment for the approved settlement was successfully issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account for repair expenses.
With payment completed and all formalities handled, the claimant's auto accident insurance claim has been officially closed.
The case files and all documents related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
